title: Morpholine-modified Ru-based agents with multiple antibacterial mechanisms as metalloantibiotic candidates against Staphylococcus aureus infection
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20130-20144
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02667E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Shijie Lin, Yun Song, Yajuan Sun, Wenjing Lin, Guangying Yu, Xiangwen Liao, Qiang Yang
A ruthenium-based agent modified with a morpholine moiety, Ru(II)-3 not only possessed excellent bactericidal efficacy, but also overcome bacterial resistance. In addition, it also showed significant anti-infective activity in vivo.
